content: treasure trove wrap by stephen west choose five colors of fingering weight yarn and fade them from light to dark with this wide wrap this textured fabric is knitted with the fascinating dip stitch technique this elegant stitch pattern forms a biased shape with beautiful diagonal lines the elongated stitches formed by the dip stitch form lovely little waves in the fabric that look like shells or scales you can easily customize the length of this wrap by simply binding off early for a shorter size or knit using all your yarn for the longest size this pattern includes a video tutorial demonstrating the dip stitch technique cast on and learn something new © 2024 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 1 photography by westknits version 1 treasure trove wrap by stephen west finished measurements 88″ / 224cm long 16″ / 41cm wide measurements taken after blocking the length is customizable yarn fingering weight yardage approximately 2000yds / 1830m total color a -
